locations.name: Mykonos
locations.description: Known for its cosmopolitan allure, vibrant town (Chora), and iconic windmills. Overnight likely spent on the yacht anchored near the island.

locations.name: Santorini
locations.description: Famous for its dramatic caldera views and picturesque whitewashed villages like Fira (coordinates provided) and Oia. Overnight likely spent on the yacht anchored within or near the caldera.

locations.name: Crete
locations.description: The largest Greek island, offering Minoan history (like Knossos near Heraklion - coordinates provided) and diverse landscapes. Overnight likely spent on the yacht moored near a port facilitating exploration.

locations.name: Rhodes
locations.description: Features the medieval majesty of Rhodes Old Town (coordinates provided), a UNESCO World Heritage site. Overnight likely spent on the yacht moored near Rhodes Town.
